name: Ghost Shooter (Koh Jhin Kiat)
description:
Video link:

Description for ghost shooter: 

Hi, my name is Koh Jhin Kiat.  This is my first game made by me. Yes, I know, it is terrible and lacking in additional feature that make the game interesting but go easy on me. I did this for my school assignment. I hope you like it. Write a comment here to share your thoughts about my first game. 

Ghost shooter is an action game about a soldier trying to survive the endless waves of ghost that are coming to attack him. 

Press "A" to move left.

Press "D" to move right.

Press "W" to move up.

Press "S" to move down.

Move mouse to aim and click the left mouse button to shoot.

Note: Volume warning.(Very loud)
